title: Gross Domestic Product: Private Industries: Manufacturing: Durable Goods Manufacturing for United States Metropolitan Portion
notes:
Consists primarily of tangible products that can be stored or inventoried and that can be used repeatedly or continuously over a prolonged period. This sub-group of manufacturing is not defined within the SIC or NAICS coding structure.

Consists of all counties in a state that are parts of metropolitan statistical areas.

For more information about this release go to http://www.bea.gov/newsreleases/regional/gdp_metro/gdp_metro_newsrelease.htm.
